alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Laurens; Pulaski; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 9:27PM EDT until June 25 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Laurens County in central Georgia... Dodge County in central Georgia... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Georgia... Telfair County in central Georgia... Wilcox County in central Georgia... Southern Dooly County in central Georgia... Wheeler County in central Georgia... Crisp County in central Georgia... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 927 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cedar Grove to near Union to near Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cordele, McRae, Eastman, Vienna, Abbeville, Alamo, Helena, Lumber City, Rochelle, Glenwood, Milan, Arabi, Pineview, Rhine, Scotland, Chauncey, Pitts, Jacksonville, Union and Towns. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. !** weakened. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Laurens; Pulaski; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox
